sentence.Network_en: This, I am sorry to say, is almost entirely wishful thinking.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很遗憾，这几乎完全是一厢情愿的想法。

sentence.Network_en: It is wishful thinking to expect deeper change under his leadership.
sentence.Network_cn: 指望在他的领导下发生更深层次的变革简直是痴心妄想。

sentence.Network_en: I've got a feeling that Alex likes me, but that might just be wishful thinking.
sentence.Network_cn: 我有一种感觉：亚历克斯喜欢我。但那可能只是我一相情愿的想法。

auth_sentence.content: To greet mine own land with my wishful sight.
auth_sentence.res_content: To greet mine own land with my wishful sight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To greet mine own land with my wishful sight.

auth_sentence.content: No architect can afford wishful thinking in his work.
auth_sentence.res_content: No architect can afford wishful thinking in his work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No architect can afford wishful thinking in his work.

auth_sentence.content: But even this modest rise may be wishful thinking.

Sentence.sentence: Now it turns out that may be wishful thinking.

means.word_mean: 单凭主观愿望的想法；一廂情愿

sentences.en: Such wishful thinking of theirs will never be realized.
sentences.cn: 他们的那种痴心妄想永远也不会实现。

sentences.en: His claims to be a millionaire are just wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 他声称要成为百万富翁的想法不过是一厢情愿。

sentences.en: Prices seem to have stopped rising in the shops, or is that just wishful thinking on my part?
sentences.cn: 商店里东西的价格好像不再上涨了，要不然就是我的一廂情愿？
